objects.name: Dynamic DNS
objects.description: Dynamic DNS is a automated method to rapidly update the domain name system mapping of hostnames to IPs. (Citation: FireEyeSupplyChain)

external_references.description: FireEye. (2014). SUPPLY CHAIN ANALYSIS: From Quartermaster to SunshopFireEye. Retrieved March 6, 2017.

objects.x_mitre_detectable_by_common_defenses_ex: Defender will not know at first use what is valid or hostile traffic without more context.
objects.x_mitre_difficulty_for_adversary_explana: It is relatively easy to subscribe to dynamic DNS providers or find ways to get different IP addresses from a cloud provider.
